item.description:
If you can't make it to the Monster Bash Saturday night or you just love Halloween, it's a costume party and as always great blues to dance 'til you drop on Sunday night at 7pm at the Grog in Newburyport.

For those who have never been to the Grog's downstairs dance bar, it's like being in a friend's basement having a party and the crowd is always friendly and fun. And of course, Sunday is actually Halloween!

Parker Wheeler's Blues Party includes Charlie Ferren, Mitch Chakour, Deric Dyer, Cliff Goodwin, Wolf Ginandes and Steve Bankuti.

See http://www.thegrog.co...

13 Middle St., Newburyport, MA.
item.name: Halloween in costume at The Grog
